languages.text: "Скверна Сай'лантреш постепенно стирается с лика Первозданного мира. Лилэтан никогда не обретет бывшей чистоты... но теперь у Мирового духа есть верный страж".

traits.locale_text: "Скверна Сай'лантреш постепенно стирается с лика Первозданного мира. Лилэтан никогда не обретет бывшей чистоты... но теперь у Мирового духа есть верный страж".

languages.text: "Sai'lanthresh's corruption is slowly being purged from the face of the Maiden World. The Lilaethan will never regain her former purity... but now the World Spirit has a faithful guardian."
languages.original_text: "Скверна Сай'лантреш постепенно стирается с лика Первозданного мира. Лилэтан никогда не обретет бывшей чистоты... но теперь у Мирового духа есть верный страж".

traits.locale_text: "Sai'lanthresh's corruption slowly fades away from the face of the Maiden World. The Lilaethan will never regain its former purity... but now the world spirit has a faithful guardian."
"Sai'lanthresh's corruption slowly fades away from the face of the Maiden World. The Lilaethan will never regain its former purity... but now the world spirit has a faithful guardian."
"Sai'lanthresh's corruption is slowly being purged from the face of the Maiden World. The Lilaethan will never regain its former purity... but now the World Spirit has a faithful guardian."
"Sai'lanthresh's corruption is slowly being purged from the face of the Maiden World. The Lilaethan will never regain its former purity... but now the World Spirit has a faithful guardian."
"Sai'lanthresh's corruption is slowly being purged from the face of the Maiden World. The Lilaethan will never regain her former purity... but now the World Spirit has a faithful guardian."

languages.text: “这个世界正在慢慢得到净化，赛·兰斯雷什的腐化也在慢慢消除。莉莱赞恐怕永远无法恢复曾经的纯洁……但如今，它的世界之魂有了位忠实的守护者。”
languages.original_text: "Sai'lanthresh's corruption is slowly being purged from the face of the Maiden World. The Lilaethan will never regain her former purity... but now the World Spirit has a faithful guardian."

traits.locale_text: “这个世界正在慢慢得到净化，赛·兰斯雷什的腐化也在慢慢消除。莉莱赞恐怕永远无法恢复曾经的纯洁……但如今，它的世界之魂有了位忠实的守护者。”

languages.text: «Estamos purgando lentamente la corrupción de Sai'lanthresh de la faz del mundo virgen. El Lilaethan nunca recuperará su anterior pureza... pero al menos el espíritu del mundo tiene un fiel guardián».
languages.original_text: "Sai'lanthresh's corruption is slowly being purged from the face of the Maiden World. The Lilaethan will never regain her former purity... but now the World Spirit has a faithful guardian."

traits.locale_text: «Estamos purgando lentamente la corrupción de Sai'lanthresh de la faz del mundo virgen. El Lilaethan nunca recuperará su anterior pureza... pero al menos el espíritu del mundo tiene un fiel guardián».

languages.text: 「セランスレッシュの腐朽はメイデンワールドの地表から、少しずつ浄化されつつある。リラエタンが以前の清浄さを取り戻すことはまずないだろう…だが、これで世界の魂は信頼に足るガーディアンを得た」
languages.original_text: "Sai'lanthresh's corruption is slowly being purged from the face of the Maiden World. The Lilaethan will never regain her former purity... but now the World Spirit has a faithful guardian."

traits.locale_text: 「セランスレッシュの腐朽はメイデンワールドの地表から、少しずつ浄化されつつある。リラエタンが以前の清浄さを取り戻すことはまずないだろう…だが、これで世界の魂は信頼に足るガーディアンを得た」

languages.text: "Sai'lanthreshs Verderbnis wird langsam vom Angesicht der Jungfernwelt getilgt. Lileath wird nie mehr ihre frühere Reinheit zurückerlangen ... aber jetzt hat das Weltenbewusstsein einen treuen Wächter."
languages.original_text: "Sai'lanthresh's corruption is slowly being purged from the face of the Maiden World. The Lilaethan will never regain her former purity... but now the World Spirit has a faithful guardian."

traits.locale_text: "Sai'lanthreshs Verderbnis wird langsam vom Angesicht der Jungfernwelt getilgt. Lileath wird nie mehr ihre frühere Reinheit zurückerlangen ... aber jetzt hat das Weltenbewusstsein einen treuen Wächter."

languages.text: « Le monde vierge est peu à peu purgé de la corruption de Sai'lanthresh. La lilaethan ne retrouvera jamais sa pureté d'antan, mais... un gardien fidèle veille désormais sur l'esprit-monde. »
languages.original_text: "Sai'lanthresh's corruption is slowly being purged from the face of the Maiden World. The Lilaethan will never regain her former purity... but now the World Spirit has a faithful guardian."

traits.locale_text: « Le monde vierge est peu à peu purgé de la corruption de Sai'lanthresh. La lilaethan ne retrouvera jamais sa pureté d'antan, mais... un gardien fidèle veille désormais sur l'esprit-monde. »

languages.text: "Bakir Dünya yavaş yavaş Sai'lanthresh'in yozluğundan arındırılıyor. Lilaethan eski saflığına asla geri kavuşamayacak belki ama Dünya Ruhu artık sadık bir muhafıza sahip."
languages.original_text: "Sai'lanthresh's corruption is slowly being purged from the face of the Maiden World. The Lilaethan will never regain her former purity... but now the World Spirit has a faithful guardian."

traits.locale_text: "Bakir Dünya yavaş yavaş Sai'lanthresh'in yozluğundan arındırılıyor. Lilaethan eski saflığına asla geri kavuşamayacak belki ama Dünya Ruhu artık sadık bir muhafıza sahip."
